abstract: Judge William C Ryan denies parole to former Charles Manson follower Bruce Davis, who was sentenced to life in prison in 1969 for killings of Gary Hinman and Donald Shea.
lead_paragraph: A Charles Manson follower who once bragged of cutting a man’s head off lost another parole bid for two murders that have kept him imprisoned 45 years.

headline.main: California: Parole Denied Again for a Manson Acolyte
headline.print_headline: California: Parole Denied Again for a Manson Acolyte

snippet: A Charles Manson follower who once bragged of cutting a man’s head off lost another parole bid for two murders that have kept him imprisoned 45 years.
